data.title: Corporate Engagement
data.meta_description: Explore how you can build your company's brand and inspire your employees while helping the Academy flourish.
data.text:
Inspire your employees with complimentary Academy admission, private tours, and more, while aligning your business with cutting-edge research, education, and sustainability initiatives.

Corporate Memberships start at $5,000 and include prominent recognition on our donor wall and website.

Academy events are attended by over 80,000 guests every year. Sponsor a signature soirée and put your brand in sight of the Bay Area's best and brightest.

Sponsorship opportunities include Big Bang Gala, SuperNatural, NightLife, and more.

We’re making world-class science accessible to learners everywhere. Help us equip the next generation with the tools needed to understand our planet—and protect it.

Your support allows us to create free STEM resources for classrooms and offer low- or no-cost field trips to K-12 students.

Our LEED Platinum building is just the beginning. Be part of the work that's sustaining ecosystems, training citizen scientists, and transforming museum-goers into Earth ambassadors.

Sponsorship opportunities include citizen science, Hope for Reefs, and other critical conservation work.

In-kind donations help the Academy focus more on science and less on overhead. See if something your company is already producing can help our mission while helping you meet your philanthropic goals.

Current in-kind needs include underwater cameras and housing, cloud storage, wetsuits for our scientific divers, pro bono support, and more.
